pages.text: Crotalocephalus is a trilobite from the Silurian to Devonian periods. It is characterized by a longer and slender looking body compared to other traditionally oval shaped trilobites. Crotalocephalus was probably a bottom feeder.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
